metadata.title: QUALITY STREET Salted Caramel Milk Chocolate Truffles

text: QUALITY STREET Salted Caramel Milk Chocolate Truffles

Surprise someone special with the decadent and delicious holiday gift of NESTLÃ‰ QUALITY STREET Salted Caramel Milk Chocolate Truffles. Each carton opens up to individually wrapped milk chocolate truffles with a smooth salted caramel flavoured centre and coated in crunchy salted caramel pieces. Indulgent, enticing and sure to bring a smile to anyone's face, these delightful sweet treats are perfect for sharing and make for a lovely gift to cherish those special holiday moments.
QUALITY STREET Salted Caramel Milk Chocolate TrufflesFeatures and Benefits
Milk chocolate truffles with a salted caramel flavoured centre covered with salted caramel
Easy to gift and share, each carton contains individually wrapped truffles
Natural flavours and no artificial colours
100% Sustainably Sourced Cocoa certified by UTZ
QUALITY STREET has been proudly part of British heritage since 1936
QUALITY STREET Salted Caramel Milk Chocolate TrufflesNutrition Information

QUALITY STREET Salted Caramel Milk Chocolate TrufflesIngredients
Sugars (sugar, glucose-fructose), unsweetened chocolate, modified milk ingredients, cocoa butter, sorbitol, sunflower lecithin, natural flavour, invertase, salt, baking soda.
